snippet.title: Flatspace Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer for my Windows PC game Flatspace. I first developed Flatspace in 2003, and it became my most popular game by far. I released two sequels, Flatspace II and Flatspace IIk, and in 2020 I remastered this first Flatspace game with new graphics and game engine updates to release the game for free on Steam. You can get the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1210780/Flatspace/
